title: Loose hand sans serif
author: tonymcguigan

comments.content:
Looks to be a customized version of Berlin Sans (terminals have been rounded over):  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font\_bureau/berlin\_sans\_roman\_ot...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171231/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/berlin_sans_roman_ot/ot_ps/specimen/tester/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font\_bureau/berlin\_sans\_roman\_ot/ot\_ps/specimen/tester/")
